function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Hypersensitivity reaction of occupants to essential oils","Impact":"Potential health issues for sensitive occupants","Mitigation":"Use alternative air cleaning methods","Technologies":"Air cleaning technologies without essential oils","People":"Occupants with hypersensitivity","Owner":"Building managers"},{"Description":"Toxicity of essential oils to human and microbial cells","Impact":"Risk of harm to human and microbial cells","Mitigation":"Avoid use of essential oils or use in well-ventilated areas","Technologies":"Biological safety measures, ventilation systems","People":"Occupants, building staff","Owner":"Occupants, building managers"},{"Description":"Negative effects of silver nanoparticles on health","Impact":"Health risks from exposure to silver nanoparticles","Mitigation":"Conduct further investigations, use in controlled environments","Technologies":"Nanoparticle filters, controlled release systems","People":"Occupants, researchers","Owner":"Researchers, regulatory authorities"},{"Description":"Insufficient data on minimum ventilation requirement for public premises","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne infections","Mitigation":"Conduct research to establish ventilation guidelines","Technologies":"Air quality monitoring systems, ventilation control systems","People":"Public premises managers, researchers","Owner":"Regulatory authorities"}]}
